articles.title: Rupee ends 2022 as worst-performing Asian currency: Report - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The rupee finished the year at 82.72 to the U.S. currency, down from 74.33 at the end of 2021, while the dollar index was headed for its biggest yearly gain since 2015.
